summary: Completed comprehensive testing of extended 6-day workflow for Global Issues podcast/vlog project. Successfully verified all new features including Day 3 grammar checklist and vocabulary, Day 4 script templates, Day 5 production tools, Day 6 reflection questions, and updated progress indicators showing /6 instead of /5.
